channel.title: whonix gateway can't install open ssh server
channel.description:
hello
i have a problem with whonix gateway
i can't install the open ssh server in the terminal it shows failed to fetch and Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org'
root@host:/home/user# apt install openssh-server Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree Reading state information... Done The following extra packages will be installed: ncurses-term openssh-client openssh-sftp-server Suggested packages: ssh-askpass libpam-ssh keychain monkeysphere rssh molly-guard ufw The following NEW packages will be installed: ncurses-term openssh-client openssh-server openssh-sftp-server 0 upgraded, 4 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded. Need to get 1,615 kB of archives. After this operation, 7,808 kB of additional disk space will be used. Do you want to continue? [Y/n] y Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-client i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-sftp-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-client i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-sftp-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-client i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-sftp-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main ncurses-term all 5.9+20140913-1 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-client i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-sftp-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3 Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org' E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/n/ncurses/ncurses-term_5.9+20140913-1_all.deb Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org'
E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/o/openssh/openssh-client_6.7p1-5+deb8u3_i386.deb Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org'
E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/o/openssh/openssh-sftp-server_6.7p1-5+deb8u3_i386.deb Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org'
E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/o/openssh/openssh-server_6.7p1-5+deb8u3_i386.deb Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org'
E: Unable to fetch some archives, maybe run apt-get update or try with --fix-missing?
it's something strange that i can install the ssh client in the workstation without problems
but in the gateway it's impossible..
i restarted and reloaded tor ..
and i reboot the vm too
what should i do ?
thanks

item.title: whonix gateway can't install open ssh server
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Change your Tor circuit. Then use nslookup for the failing DNS names
in the workstation. That sometimes makes Tor learn the DNS and then it
works even on the gateway.

Read full topic
item.source: whonix gateway can't install open ssh server

item.title: whonix gateway can't install open ssh server
item.dc:creator: y010
item.description:
it’s done

but the result doesn’t change…

root@host:/home/user# apt-get update
Hit http://deb.whonix.org jessie InRelease
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates InRelease
Ign http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie InRelease
Hit http://deb.whonix.org jessie/main i386 Packages
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/main i386 Packages
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie Release.gpg
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/contrib i386 Packages
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/non-free i386 Packages
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie Release
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/contrib Translation-en
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie/main i386 Packages
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/main Translation-en
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie/contrib i386 Packages
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/non-free Translation-en
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie/non-free i386 Packages
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie/contrib Translation-en
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie/main Translation-en
Hit http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie/non-free Translation-en
Ign http://deb.whonix.org jessie/main Translation-en_US
Ign http://deb.whonix.org jessie/main Translation-en
Reading package lists… Done
root@host:/home/user# sudo apt install openssh-server
Reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information… Done

root@host:/home/user# sudo apt install openssh-server
Reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information… Done
The following extra packages will be installed:
ncurses-term openssh-client openssh-sftp-server
Suggested packages:
ssh-askpass libpam-ssh keychain monkeysphere rssh molly-guard ufw
The following NEW packages will be installed:
ncurses-term openssh-client openssh-server openssh-sftp-server
0 upgraded, 4 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
Need to get 1,615 kB of archives.
After this operation, 7,808 kB of additional disk space will be used.
Do you want to continue? [Y/n] y
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main ncurses-term all 5.9+20140913-1
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-client i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main ncurses-term all 5.9+20140913-1
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-sftp-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-client i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-sftp-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie/main openssh-server i386 1:6.7p1-5+deb8u3
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/n/ncurses/ncurses-term_5.9+20140913-1_all.deb Temporary failure resolving ‘ftp.us.debian.org’

E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/o/openssh/openssh-client_6.7p1-5+deb8u3_i386.deb Temporary failure resolving ‘ftp.us.debian.org’

E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/o/openssh/openssh-sftp-server_6.7p1-5+deb8u3_i386.deb Temporary failure resolving ‘ftp.us.debian.org’

E: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/pool/main/o/openssh/openssh-server_6.7p1-5+deb8u3_i386.deb Temporary failure resolving ‘ftp.us.debian.org’

E: Unable to fetch some archives, maybe run apt-get update or try with --fix-missing?

root@host:/home/user# sudo apt update --fix-missing
Err http://deb.whonix.org jessie InRelease

Err http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie InRelease

Err http://deb.whonix.org jessie Release.gpg
Temporary failure resolving 'deb.whonix.org’
Err http://ftp.us.debian.org jessie Release.gpg
Temporary failure resolving 'ftp.us.debian.org’
Err http://security.debian.org jessie/updates InRelease

Err http://security.debian.org jessie/updates Release.gpg
Temporary failure resolving 'security.debian.org’
Reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information… Done
All packages are up to date.
W: Failed to fetch http://security.debian.org/dists/jessie/updates/InRelease

W: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/dists/jessie/InRelease

W: Failed to fetch http://deb.whonix.org/dists/jessie/InRelease

W: Failed to fetch http://deb.whonix.org/dists/jessie/Release.gpg Temporary failure resolving ‘deb.whonix.org’

W: Failed to fetch http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/dists/jessie/Release.gpg Temporary failure resolving ‘ftp.us.debian.org’

W: Failed to fetch http://security.debian.org/dists/jessie/updates/Release.gpg Temporary failure resolving ‘security.debian.org’

W: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.

i’m going to donwload the vm again …

=/
